headline: Omnicom Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: Omnicom (NYSE: OMC) will publish its second quarter 2025 results on Tuesday, July 15, 2025 after the New York Stock Exchange close of trading. The company will also host a conference call to review such financial results on Tuesday, July 15, 2025, starting at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. A live webcast of the call will be available at Omnicom's investor relations website, investor.omnicomgroup.com, along with the related earnings press release and slide presentation. A webcast replay will be made ava
